title: Yury Maleyew
text:
Yury Ivanavich Maleyew (, ; born 20 March 1968 in <a href="Bykhaw">Bykhaw</a>) is a <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach and former player. From 2010 till 2013 he was a manager of <a href="FC%20Slavia%20Mozyr">Slavia Mozyr</a>.
Playing career.
Maleyew played for <a href="FC%20Dnepr%20Mogilev">Dnepr Mogilev</a> and <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Zhodino">Torpedo Zhodino</a> in the <a href="Belarusian%20Premier%20League">Belarusian Premier League</a> and <a href="Zawisza%20Bydgoszcz">Zawisza Bydgoszcz</a> the <a href="Poland">Polish</a> <a href="Ekstraklasa">Ekstraklasa</a>. He also made nine appearances for the <a href="Belarus%20national%20football%20team">Belarus national football team</a>.
Honours.
MPKC Mozyr
